TopicTitle: [BUG] VAB menu icons zoom away when 3+ decoupler nodes are on a part

Articles.Content:
This problem has been here for a very long time. Other modders have reported it with parts that contain 3+ resource types, and have been able to solve it by intermixing the various modules in the part CFG.

However, there seems to be no workaround when the part contains 3+ decoupler modules.

What happens is that the part's icon in the VAB/SPH menu will zoom outward and vanish to infinity, when the mouse hovers over that part icon. Video below.

You might wonder what the usefulness of this might be. After all, there is the omni-decoupler option, right? Well, you might have a part where you want all but one nodes to detach, and it may have nodes in multiple places (not just a simple stackable part).
